Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Djedhor with a lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard and crossed hands holding an incised adze, hoe and string of the seed-bag that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg-section is inscribed with a column of black Hieroglyphs; back-pillar and plinth.
Curator's comments: Petrie, Abydos I, 38-9, pl.LXXIX, 1, far right.
